Summary: Hello? What R U Waiting 4? Great Deal!
text:
1. Cheaper than Costco or Winco
2. Expiration date: I had 1 year to go on mine
3. Great taste and fresh
4. Just do an order over $25 and get free shipping!
5. Easy to order
6. Delivery to your door
7. Wow, what is not to like on this one?
8. And this was my first food order from Amazon -- nice.
